title: THD build fails on macOS 10.12.6
body_html:
I'm trying to compile pytorch on macOS with XCode 7 (downgraded from 8) and Cuda 8. Everything works great until the build process hits THD, then I get this:

thread_local not supported.  THD requires a compiler that supports
  thread_local.  Please upgrade your compiler.  If you are on macOS, upgrade
  to XCode 8 or newer.

The problem is that if I switch to XCode 8, nothing works (as has been covered in many other issues).

Can anybody help me to somehow compile THD with XCode 8 while using 7 for everything else?

body:
I'm trying to compile pytorch on macOS with XCode 7 (downgraded from 8) and Cuda 8. Everything works great until the build process hits THD, then I get this:

```
thread_local not supported.  THD requires a compiler that supports
  thread_local.  Please upgrade your compiler.  If you are on macOS, upgrade
  to XCode 8 or newer.
```

The problem is that if I switch to XCode 8, nothing works (as has been covered in many other issues).

Can anybody help me to somehow compile THD with XCode 8 while using 7 for everything else?
